### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Trials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  sponsor VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50)
);


CREATE TABLE Participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  PRIMARY KEY (participant_id, trial_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES Trials(trial_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Trials SET sponsor='ABC Corp' WHERE trial_id=1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  consent_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trials (
  trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE results (
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id UUID,
  participant_id UUID,
  result_date DATE,
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_description TEXT
)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    lead_researcher VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Biomarkers (
    biomarker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    biomarker_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    validation_method VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    trial_id INT,
    biomarker_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    sample_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES Trials(trial_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (biomarker_id) REFERENCES Biomarkers(biomarker_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Patients SET age = 35 WHERE patient_id = 1;
